070public class MoneyCommand extends BaseCommand {
071
072  //ArgumentsParser: [currency]
073  public static void onMyBal(final CmdSource<?> sender) {
074
075    if(sender.player().isPresent()) {
076      sender.player().get().inventory().openMenu(sender.player().get(), "my_bal");
077    }
078  }
079
080  //ArgumentsParser: [currency] [world]
081  public static void onBalance(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Currency currency, final String region) {
082
083    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
084    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
085      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.balance." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
086        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
087        data.addReplacement("$action", "balance check");
088        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
089        sender.message(data);
090        return;
091      }
092    }
093
094    if(sender.player().isPresent() && MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Commands.GUIAlternatives", true)) {
095      sender.player().get().inventory().openMenu(sender.player().get(), "my_bal");
096      return;
097    }
098
099    final Optional<Account> account = BaseCommand.account(sender, "balance");
100    if(account.isEmpty()) {
101      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
102      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
103      sender.message(data);
104      return;
105    }
106    onOther(sender, account.get(), region, currency);
107  }
108
109  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> <to currency> [from currency]
110  public static void onConvert(final CmdSource<?> sender, final PercentBigDecimal amount, final Currency currency, final Currency fromCurrency) {
111
112    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
113    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
114      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.convert.to." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
115        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
116        data.addReplacement("$action", "convert to");
117        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
118        sender.message(data);
119        return;
120      }
121
122      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.convert.from." + fromCurrency.getIdentifier())) {
123        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
124        data.addReplacement("$action", "convert from");
125        data.addReplacement("$currency", fromCurrency.getDisplay());
126        sender.message(data);
127        return;
128      }
129    }
130
131    if(amount.value().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
132      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
133      return;
134    }
135
136    if(currency.getUid().equals(fromCurrency.getUid())) {
137      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.ConvertSame"));
138      return;
139    }
140
141    final Optional<Account> account = BaseCommand.account(sender, "convert");
142    if(account.isEmpty()) {
143      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
144      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
145      sender.message(data);
146      return;
147    }
148
149    final Optional<BigDecimal> converted = fromCurrency.convertValue(currency.getIdentifier(), amount.value());
150    if(converted.isEmpty()) {
151      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.NoConversion");
152      data.addReplacement("$converted", currency.getIdentifier());
153      sender.message(data);
154      return;
155    }
156
157    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
158                                                           currency.getUid(),
159                                                           converted.get().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN)
160    );
161
162    final HoldingsModifier modifierFrom = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
163                                                               fromCurrency.getUid(),
164                                                               amount.value().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN).negate()
165    );
166
167    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
168    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("convert")
169            .from(account.get(), modifierFrom)
170            .to(account.get(), modifier)
171            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
172            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
173
174    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.get().getName(), amount.value());
175    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
176      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Converted");
177      data.addReplacement("$from_amount", amount.value().toPlainString());
178      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(),
179                                                              modifierFrom.asEntry()));
180      sender.message(data);
181    }
182  }
183
184  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [currency]
185  public static void onDeposit(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
186
187    String region = parseMoney.region();
188    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
189
190    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
191    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
192      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.deposit." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
193        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
194        data.addReplacement("$action", "deposit");
195        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
196        sender.message(data);
197        return;
198      }
199    }
200
201    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
202      region = player.get().world();
203    }
204
205    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
206      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
207      return;
208    }
209
210    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "deposit");
211
212    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
213      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
214      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
215      sender.message(data);
216      return;
217    }
218
219    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
220
221    if(!(currency.type() instanceof MixedType)) {
222      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.NotMixed"));
223      return;
224    }
225
226    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
227                                                           currency.getUid(),
228                                                           parseMoney.amount(),
229                                                           EconomyManager.VIRTUAL
230    );
231
232    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
233    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("deposit")
234            .to(senderAccount.get(), modifier)
235            .from(senderAccount.get(), modifier.counter(EconomyManager.ITEM_ONLY))
236            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
237            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
238
239    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, senderAccount.get().getName(), parseMoney.amount());
240    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
241      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Deposit");
242      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(senderAccount.get(),
243                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
244      sender.message(data);
245    }
246  }
247
248  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [world] [currency]
249  public static void onGive(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final String region, final Currency currency) {
250
251
252    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
253    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent() && !player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.give." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
254
255      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
256      data.addReplacement("$action", "give funds");
257      data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
258      sender.message(data);
259      return;
260    }
261
262
263    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(parseMoney.region(),
264                                                           parseMoney.currency().getUid(),
265                                                           parseMoney.amount());
266
267    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
268    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("give")
269            .to(account, modifier)
270            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
271
272    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
273    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
274      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Gave");
275      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
276      data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
277      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
278                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
279      sender.message(data);
280
281      final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Given");
282      msgData.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
283      msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
284      msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
285
286      MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
287      if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
288
289        final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
290
291        provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
292      }
293    }
294  }
295
296  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [world] [currency]
297  public static void onGiveAll(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final String regionParam, final Currency currencyParam) {
298
299    final String region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(parseMoney.region());
300    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
301
302    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
303    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
304      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.give." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
305        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
306        data.addReplacement("$action", "give funds");
307        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
308        sender.message(data);
309        return;
310      }
311    }
312
313    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
314                                                           currency.getUid(),
315                                                           parseMoney.amount());
316
317    final List<String> accounts = new ArrayList<>();
318
319    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
320    for(final Account account : TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values()) {
321
322      final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("give")
323              .to(account, modifier)
324              .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
325
326      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
327      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
328
329        accounts.add(account.getName());
330
331        final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Given");
332        msgData.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
333        msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
334        msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
335
336        MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
337        if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
338
339          final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
340
341          provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
342        }
343      }
344    }
345
346    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Gave");
347    data.addReplacement("$player", String.join(", ", accounts));
348    data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
349    data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(null, modifier.asEntry()));
350    sender.message(data);
351  }
352
353  public static void onGiveNote(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account acc, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency) {
354
355    final Optional<Note> note = parseMoney.currency().getNote();
356
357    final Optional<Account> accountOpt = BaseCommand.account(acc.getIdentifier(), "note");
358    final Account account = accountOpt.orElse(acc);
359    if(note.isPresent() && account instanceof final PlayerAccount player) {
360
361      final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = player.getPlayer();
362
363      if(provider.isEmpty() || !player.isOnline()) {
364        sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.CreateOffline"));
365        return;
366      }
367
368      if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(note.get().getMinimum()) < 0) {
369        final MessageData min = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Minimum");
370        min.addReplacement("$amount", note.get().getMinimum().toPlainString());
371        sender.message(min);
372        return;
373      }
374
375      final BigDecimal rounded = parseMoney.amount().setScale(parseMoney.currency().getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN);
376
377      final Collection<AbstractItemStack<Object>> left = PluginCore.server().calculations().giveItems(Collections.singletonList(note.get().stack(parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier(), BaseCommand.region(sender), rounded)), provider.get().inventory().getInventory(false));
378
379      final MessageData entryMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Given");
380      entryMSG.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
381      entryMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, rounded));
382      provider.get().message(entryMSG);
383
384      final MessageData senderMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Created");
385      senderMSG.addReplacement("$player", provider.get().getName());
386      senderMSG.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
387      senderMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, rounded));
388      sender.message(senderMSG);
389
390      if(!left.isEmpty()) {
391        PluginCore.server().calculations().drop(left, player.getUUID(), true);
392        provider.get().message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.Dropped"));
393      }
394      return;
395    }
396    sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.CreateOffline"));
397  }
398
399  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [currency]
400  public static void onNote(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency) {
401
402    final Optional<Account> account = BaseCommand.account(sender, "note");
403    final Optional<Note> note = parseMoney.currency().getNote();
404    if(account.isPresent() && note.isPresent() && account.get() instanceof final PlayerAccount player) {
405
406      final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = player.getPlayer();
407      if(provider.isEmpty()) {
408        return;
409      }
410
411      if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && !provider.get().hasPermission("tne.money.note." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
412        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
413        data.addReplacement("$action", "note");
414        data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
415        sender.message(data);
416        return;
417      }
418
419      if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(note.get().getMinimum()) < 0) {
420        final MessageData min = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Minimum");
421        min.addReplacement("$amount", note.get().getMinimum().toPlainString());
422        sender.message(min);
423        return;
424      }
425
426      final BigDecimal rounded = parseMoney.amount().setScale(parseMoney.currency().getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN);
427
428      final BigDecimal amt = rounded.add(note.get().getFee().calculateTax(rounded)).setScale(parseMoney.currency().getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN);
429
430      final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
431                                                             parseMoney.currency().getUid(),
432                                                             amt
433      );
434
435      final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
436      final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("note")
437              .from(account.get(), modifier.counter())
438              .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
439              .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
440
441
442      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.get().getName(), parseMoney.amount());
443      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
444        final Collection<AbstractItemStack<Object>> left = PluginCore.server().calculations().giveItems(Collections.singletonList(note.get().stack(parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier(), BaseCommand.region(sender), rounded)), provider.get().inventory().getInventory(false));
445
446        final MessageData entryMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Note.Given");
447        entryMSG.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
448        entryMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account.get(), modifier.asEntry()));
449        sender.message(entryMSG);
450
451        if(!left.isEmpty()) {
452          PluginCore.server().calculations().drop(left, ((PlayerAccount)account.get()).getUUID(), true);
453          sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Note.Dropped"));
454        }
455      }
456    }
457  }
458
459  //ArgumentsParser: <player> [world] [currency]
460  public static void onOther(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, String region, final Currency currency) {
461
462    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
463    final Optional<UUID> senderID = sender.identifier();
464
465    final boolean other = (senderID.isPresent() && !senderID.get().equals(account.getIdentifier()));
466
467    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent() && other) {
468      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.other." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
469        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
470        data.addReplacement("$action", "balance check other");
471        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
472        sender.message(data);
473        return;
474      }
475    }
476
477    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
478      region = player.get().world();
479    }
480
481    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
482
483    final String resolve = region;
484
485    if(TNECore.eco().region().getDisabledRegions().contains(resolve)) {
486
487      final MessageData regionMSG = new MessageData("Messages.General.Disabled");
488      sender.message(regionMSG);
489      return;
490    }
491
492    final String header = (other)? "Messages.Money.HoldingsMultiOther" : "Messages.Money.HoldingsMulti";
493
494    final MessageData msg = new MessageData(header);
495    msg.addReplacement("$world", MISCUtils.worldFormatted(region));
496    msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
497    sender.message(msg);
498
499    TNECore.eco().currency().currencies().forEach((cur)->{
500      if(cur.isBalanceShow()) {
501        printBalance(sender, account, resolve, cur);
502      }
503    });
504  }
505
506  public static void printBalance(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final String region, final Currency currency) {
507
508    final MessageData entryMSG = new MessageData("Messages.Money.HoldingsMultiSingle");
509    entryMSG.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
510
511    BigDecimal amount = BigDecimal.ZERO;
512    for(final HoldingsEntry entry : currency.type().getHoldings(account, region, currency, EconomyManager.NORMAL)) {
513      amount = amount.add(entry.getAmount());
514
515      if(entry.getHandler().asID().equalsIgnoreCase(EconomyManager.INVENTORY_ONLY.asID())) {
516        if(currency.type().supportsItems()) {
517          entryMSG.addReplacement("$inventory", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, entry));
518        } else {
519          entryMSG.addReplacement("$inventory", "0");
520        }
521      }
522
523      if(entry.getHandler().asID().equalsIgnoreCase(EconomyManager.E_CHEST.asID())) {
524        if(currency.type().supportsItems()) {
525          entryMSG.addReplacement("$ender", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, entry));
526        } else {
527          entryMSG.addReplacement("$ender", "0");
528        }
529      }
530
531      if(entry.getHandler().asID().equalsIgnoreCase(EconomyManager.VIRTUAL.asID())) {
532        entryMSG.addReplacement("$virtual", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, entry));
533      }
534    }
535    entryMSG.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, new HoldingsEntry(region, currency.getUid(), amount, EconomyManager.NORMAL)));
536    sender.message(entryMSG);
537  }
538
539  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [currency] [from:account]
540  public static void onPay(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account acc, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency, final String from) {
541
542    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
543    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
544      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.pay." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
545        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
546        data.addReplacement("$action", "pay");
547        data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
548        sender.message(data);
549        return;
550      }
551    }
552
553    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
554      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
555      return;
556    }
557
558    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "pay");
559
560    final Optional<Account> accountOpt = BaseCommand.account(acc.getIdentifier(), "payreceive");
561    final Account account = accountOpt.orElse(acc);
562
563    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
564      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
565      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
566      sender.message(data);
567      return;
568    }
569
570    if(senderAccount.get().getIdentifier().equals(account.getIdentifier())) {
571      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.SelfPay");
572      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
573      sender.message(data);
574      return;
575    }
576
577    if(!MainConfig.yaml().getBoolean("Core.Commands.Pay.Offline", true)) {
578      if(!(account instanceof PlayerAccount) || !((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
579
580        sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.PayFailedOnline"));
581        return;
582      }
583    }
584
585    if(MainConfig.yaml().getInt("Core.Commands.Pay.Radius", 0) > 0) {
586      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.PayFailedDistance");
587      data.addReplacement("$distance", String.valueOf(MainConfig.yaml().getInt("Core.Commands.Pay.Radius")));
588
589      if(!(senderAccount.get() instanceof PlayerAccount) || !((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).isOnline()
590         || !(account instanceof PlayerAccount) || !((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
591        sender.message(data);
592        return;
593      }
594
595      final Optional<PlayerProvider> senderPlayer = ((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).getPlayer();
596      final Optional<PlayerProvider> playerPlayer = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
597      if(senderPlayer.isEmpty() || playerPlayer.isEmpty()
598         || senderPlayer.get().getLocation().isEmpty() || playerPlayer.get().getLocation().isEmpty()) {
599        sender.message(data);
600        return;
601      }
602
603      if(senderPlayer.get().getLocation().get().distance(playerPlayer.get().getLocation().get()) > MainConfig.yaml().getInt("Core.Commands.Pay.Radius")) {
604        sender.message(data);
605        return;
606      }
607    }
608
609    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
610                                                           parseMoney.currency().getUid(),
611                                                           parseMoney.amount()
612    );
613
614    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
615    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("pay")
616            .to(account, modifier)
617            .from(senderAccount.get(), modifier.counter())
618            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
619            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
620
621    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
622    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
623      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Paid");
624      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
625      data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
626      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
627                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
628      sender.message(data);
629
630      final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Received");
631      msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
632      msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
633      MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
634
635      if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
636
637        final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(((PlayerAccount)account).getUUID());
638        provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
639      }
640    }
641  }
642
643  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [currency]
644  public static void onRequest(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currency) {
645
646    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
647    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
648      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.request." + parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier())) {
649        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
650        data.addReplacement("$action", "request funds");
651        data.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getDisplay());
652        sender.message(data);
653        return;
654      }
655    }
656
657    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
658      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
659      return;
660    }
661
662    final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = PluginCore.server().findPlayer(((PlayerAccount)account).getUUID());
663    if(provider.isEmpty()) {
664      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
665      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
666      sender.message(data);
667      return;
668    }
669
670    final MessageData msg = new MessageData("Messages.Money.RequestSender");
671    msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
672    msg.addReplacement("$amount", parseMoney.amount().toPlainString());
673    sender.message(msg);
674
675    final MessageData request = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Request");
676    request.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
677    request.addReplacement("$amount", parseMoney.amount().toPlainString());
678    request.addReplacement("$currency", parseMoney.currency().getIdentifier());
679    provider.get().message(request);
680  }
681
682  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [world] [currency]
683  public static void onSet(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final String regionParam, final Currency currencyParam) {
684
685    String region = parseMoney.region();
686    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
687
688    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
689    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
690      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.set." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
691        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
692        data.addReplacement("$action", "set funds");
693        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
694        sender.message(data);
695        return;
696      }
697    }
698
699    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
700      region = player.get().world();
701    }
702
703    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
704
705    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
706                                                           currency.getUid(),
707                                                           parseMoney.amount().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN),
708                                                           HoldingsOperation.SET);
709
710    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
711    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("set")
712            .to(account, modifier)
713            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
714            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
715
716    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
717
718    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
719      final MessageData msg = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Set");
720      msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
721      msg.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
722      msg.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
723                                                             modifier.asEntry())
724                        );
725      sender.message(msg);
726    }
727  }
728
729  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [world] [currency]
730  public static void onSetAll(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final String regionParam, final Currency currencyParam) {
731
732    String region = parseMoney.region();
733    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
734
735    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
736    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
737      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.setall." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
738        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
739        data.addReplacement("$action", "set all funds");
740        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
741        sender.message(data);
742        return;
743      }
744    }
745
746    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
747      region = player.get().world();
748    }
749
750    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
751
752    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
753                                                           currency.getUid(),
754                                                           parseMoney.amount().setScale(currency.getDecimalPlaces(), RoundingMode.DOWN),
755                                                           HoldingsOperation.SET);
756
757    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
758    for(final Account account : TNECore.eco().account().getAccounts().values()) {
759      final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("set")
760              .to(account, modifier)
761              .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
762              .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
763
764      final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
765
766      if(receipt.isPresent()) {
767        final MessageData msg = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Set");
768        msg.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
769        msg.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
770        msg.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
771                                                               modifier.asEntry())
772                          );
773
774        msg.addReplacements(new String[]{
775                ""
776        }, new String[]{
777
778        });
779        sender.message(msg);
780        return;
781      }
782    }
783  }
784
785  public static void onSwitch(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account) {
786
787    if(account instanceof final SharedAccount shared) {
788
789      if(sender.identifier().isEmpty()) {
790
791        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.SwitchedFailed");
792        data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
793        sender.message(data);
794        return;
795      }
796
797      if(!shared.hasPermission(sender.identifier().get(), MemberPermissions.WITHDRAW)) {
798
799        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.SwitchedFailed");
800        data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
801        sender.message(data);
802        return;
803      }
804
805      doSwitch(sender.identifier().get(), account.getIdentifier());
806      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.Switched");
807      data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
808      sender.message(data);
809      return;
810    } else {
811      if(sender.identifier().isPresent() && sender.player().isPresent()) {
812
813        if(account.getIdentifier().equals(sender.identifier().get()) || sender.player().get().hasPermission("tne.money.switch.override")) {
814
815          doSwitch(sender.identifier().get(), account.getIdentifier());
816          final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.Switched");
817          data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
818          sender.message(data);
819          return;
820        }
821      }
822    }
823    final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.SwitchedFailed");
824    data.addReplacement("$account", account.getName());
825    sender.message(data);
826  }
827
828  //helper method for onSwitch
829  private static void doSwitch(final UUID account, final UUID swapAccount) {
830
831    if(swapAccount.equals(account)) {
832      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("balance", account);
833      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("convert", account);
834      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("deposit", account);
835      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("note", account);
836      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("pay", account);
837      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("payreceive", account);
838      TNECore.eco().account().removeSwap("withdraw", account);
839      return;
840    }
841    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("balance", account, swapAccount);
842    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("convert", account, swapAccount);
843    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("deposit", account, swapAccount);
844    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("note", account, swapAccount);
845    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("pay", account, swapAccount);
846    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("payreceive", account, swapAccount);
847    TNECore.eco().account().addSwap("withdraw", account, swapAccount);
848  }
849
850  //ArgumentsParser: <player> <amount> [world] [currency]
851  public static void onTake(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Account account, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final String regionParam, final Currency currencyParam) {
852
853    String region = parseMoney.region();
854    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
855
856    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
857    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
858      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.take." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
859        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
860        data.addReplacement("$action", "take funds");
861        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
862        sender.message(data);
863        return;
864      }
865    }
866
867    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
868      region = player.get().world();
869    }
870
871    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
872
873
874    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(region,
875                                                           currency.getUid(),
876                                                           parseMoney.amount()
877    );
878
879    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
880    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("take")
881            .to(account, modifier.counter())
882            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
883            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
884
885    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, account.getName(), parseMoney.amount());
886    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
887      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Took");
888      data.addReplacement("$player", account.getName());
889      data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
890      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account,
891                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
892      sender.message(data);
893
894      final MessageData msgData = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Taken");
895      msgData.addReplacement("$player", (sender.name() == null)? MainConfig.yaml().getString("Core.Server.Account.Name") : sender.name());
896      msgData.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
897      msgData.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(account, modifier.asEntry()));
898      MessageHandler.send(account.getIdentifier(), msgData.grab(account.getIdentifier()));
899
900      if(account.isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)account).isOnline()) {
901
902        final Optional<PlayerProvider> provider = ((PlayerAccount)account).getPlayer();
903
904        provider.ifPresent(playerProvider->playerProvider.message(msgData));
905      }
906    }
907  }
908
909  //ArgumentsParser: [page] [currency:name] [world:world] [limit:#]
910  public static void onTop(final CmdSource<?> sender, Integer page, final Currency currency, final Boolean refresh) {
911
912    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
913    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
914      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.top." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
915        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
916        data.addReplacement("$action", "balance top");
917        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
918        sender.message(data);
919        return;
920      }
921    }
922
923    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "top");
924
925    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
926      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
927      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
928      sender.message(data);
929      return;
930    }
931
932    if(player.isPresent() && TNECore.eco().region().getDisabledRegions().contains(player.get().world())) {
933
934      final MessageData regionMSG = new MessageData("Messages.General.Disabled");
935      sender.message(regionMSG);
936      return;
937    }
938
939    if(refresh && !senderAccount.get().isPlayer() || refresh && senderAccount.get().isPlayer() && ((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).getPlayer().isPresent()
940                                                     && ((PlayerAccount)senderAccount.get()).getPlayer().get().hasPermission("tne.money.top.refresh")) {
941
942      TopManager.instance().load();
943    }
944    final int max = TNECore.eco().getTopManager().page(currency.getUid());
945
946    if(page < 1) page = 1;
947    if(page > max) page = max;
948
949    final TopPage<String> pageEntry = TNECore.eco().getTopManager().page(page, currency.getUid());
950    if(pageEntry != null) {
951      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Top");
952      data.addReplacement("$page", String.valueOf(page));
953      data.addReplacement("$page_top", String.valueOf(max));
954      sender.message(data);
955
956      final int adjusted = (page - 1) * TOP_PER_PAGE;
957      int i = 1;
958      for(final Map.Entry<String, BigDecimal> entry : pageEntry.getValues().entrySet()) {
959        final MessageData en = new MessageData("Messages.Money.TopEntry");
960        en.addReplacement("$pos", (adjusted + i));
961        en.addReplacement("$player", entry.getKey());
962        en.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(senderAccount.get(), new HoldingsEntry(TNECore.eco().region().defaultRegion(), currency.getUid(), entry.getValue(), EconomyManager.NORMAL)));
963        sender.message(en);
964
965        i++;
966      }
967    }
968  }
969
970  //ArgumentsParser: <amount> [currency]
971  public static void onWithdraw(final CmdSource<?> sender, final ParseMoney parseMoney, final Currency currencyParam, final String regionParam) {
972
973    String region = parseMoney.region();
974    final Currency currency = parseMoney.currency();
975
976    final Optional<PlayerProvider> player = sender.player();
977    if(EconomyManager.limitCurrency() && player.isPresent()) {
978      if(!player.get().hasPermission("tne.money.withdraw." + currency.getIdentifier())) {
979        final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Account.BlockedAction");
980        data.addReplacement("$action", "withdraw funds");
981        data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getDisplay());
982        sender.message(data);
983        return;
984      }
985    }
986
987    if(player.isPresent() && region.equalsIgnoreCase("world-113")) {
988      region = player.get().world();
989    }
990
991    if(parseMoney.amount().compareTo(BigDecimal.ZERO) < 0) {
992      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.Negative"));
993      return;
994    }
995
996    final Optional<Account> senderAccount = BaseCommand.account(sender, "withdraw");
997    if(senderAccount.isEmpty()) {
998      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.General.NoPlayer");
999      data.addReplacement("$player", sender.name());
1000      sender.message(data);
1001      return;
1002    }
1003
1004    region = TNECore.eco().region().resolve(region);
1005
1006    if(!(currency.type() instanceof MixedType)) {
1007      sender.message(new MessageData("Messages.Money.NotMixed"));
1008      return;
1009    }
1010
1011    final HoldingsModifier modifier = new HoldingsModifier(BaseCommand.region(sender),
1012                                                           currency.getUid(),
1013                                                           parseMoney.amount(),
1014                                                           EconomyManager.ITEM_ONLY
1015    );
1016
1017    final UUID sourceID = (sender.identifier().isPresent())? sender.identifier().get() : TNECore.instance().getServerAccount();
1018    final Transaction transaction = new Transaction("withdraw")
1019            .to(senderAccount.get(), modifier)
1020            .from(senderAccount.get(), modifier.counter(EconomyManager.VIRTUAL))
1021            .processor(EconomyManager.baseProcessor())
1022            .source(new PlayerSource(sourceID));
1023
1024    final Optional<Receipt> receipt = processTransaction(sender, transaction, senderAccount.get().getName(), parseMoney.amount());
1025    if(receipt.isPresent()) {
1026
1027      final MessageData data = new MessageData("Messages.Money.Withdrawn");
1028      data.addReplacement("$currency", currency.getIdentifier());
1029      data.addReplacement("$amount", CurrencyFormatter.format(senderAccount.get(),
1030                                                              modifier.asEntry()));
1031      sender.message(data);
1032    }
1033  }
1034
1035  public static Optional<Receipt> processTransaction(final CmdSource<?> sender, final Transaction transaction, final String modifiedAccount, final BigDecimal modifier) {
1036
1037    try {
1038      final TransactionResult result = transaction.process();
1039
1040      if(!result.isSuccessful()) {
1041        final MessageData data = new MessageData(result.getMessage());
1042        data.addReplacement("$player", modifiedAccount);
1043        data.addReplacement("$amount", modifier.toPlainString());
1044
1045        sender.message(data);
1046        return Optional.empty();
1047      }
1048
1049      return result.getReceipt();
1050    } catch(final InvalidTransactionException e) {
1051      e.printStackTrace();
1052    }
1053    return Optional.empty();
1054  }
1055}
